plot: Talent agent, Bela, tired of her lazy clients, sets her sites on her dream actor, Julio. Julio will do whatever it takes to make it as an actor. One project, one audition, one shot.
title: Bela: La agente
plot_es: Talent agent, Bela, tired of her lazy clients, sets her sites on her dream actor, Julio. Julio will do whatever it takes to make it as an actor. One project, one audition, one shot.
plot_en: Talent agent, Bela, tired of her lazy clients, sets her sites on her dream actor, Julio. Julio will do whatever it takes to make it as an actor. One project, one audition, one shot.
